scripts.vercel-build: ls -al && yum install -y wget cairo cairo-devel cairomm-devel libjpeg-turbo-devel pango pango-devel pangomm pangomm-devel giflib-devel && cp /usr/lib64/{libpixman-1.so.0,libfontconfig.so.1,libfreetype.so.6.14.0,libuuid.so.1,libmount.so.1,libblkid.so.1} node_modules/canvas/build/Release/ && wget https://focux.dev/Inter.otf && cp ./Inter.otf node_modules/canvas  && npm run build && ls -al && ls -al .next
